description.value:
Trigger A living creature steps out of the room.

Effect Water sprays out of the tubs. Every creature in the room or within 10 feet of the doors takes @Damage[(4d10+26)[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true] save) and the water casts 5th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] with a counteract modifier of [[/r {1d20+18} #Counteract Check]]{+18} against the highest-rank spell active on each target (or all spells on a target that critically fails its Reflex save).

details.description: The ritual power in this room, corrupted by necromantic energy, slams purifying water into all "unclean" creatures that try to leave.
details.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:28|name:Ceremonially purify everyone] (expert) to ceremonially purify everyone in the room, by pouring water from a tub over their hands, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] (5th level; counteract DC 28) to counteract the corrupted ritual magic.

publication.title: Pathfinder Society Scenario #3-14: The Tomb Between Worlds
